mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, user_account, password, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_profile, user_role) values (#{sysUser.id}, #{sysUser.userAccount}, #{sysUser.password}, #{sysUser.userName}, #{sysUser.userEmail}, #{sysUser.userPhone}, #{sysUser.userAddress}, #{sysUser.userProfile}, #{sysUser.userRole});
